action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Opportunity in Federal Construction Act
This bill requires certain prevailing wage determinations for laborers and mechanics be made using representative statistical sample techniques.
The Government Accountability Office shall study, and report on, the implementation of Department of Labor regulations to carry out the requirement of this bill..
